title: Identify Top Performing Content of the Month
description: A content manager wants a report on the top 10 most-watched movies and TV shows on the streaming platform for the previous month.

tasks.description: Query the viewership database for all content watched last month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the raw viewership data.

tasks.description: Aggregate the data by title and sort by total hours watched.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes the data and ranks all content by viewership.

tasks.description: Generate a report listing the top 10 titles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear, ranked list of the top 10 movies and shows.
